attributes.action: Offer Barack Obama honorary citizenship and the role of Interim Prime Minister.
attributes.background:
A non-partisan statesman of Mr Obama's pedigree is just what this country needs in these turbulent times.

He can guide us through turbulent waters and towards a future of stable, tolerant democracy.

rejection.details:
As you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.

In practice, this is usually the leader of the political party that wins the most seats in a general election. You can find out more about this here: 
After a general election, the Queen decides who to invite to form a Government. 

http://www.royal.gov.uk/MonarchUK/QueenandGovernment/QueenandPrimeMinister.aspx
